com.android.slyce

Class SlyceCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
      • com.android.slyce.SlyceCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceCameraInterface

    public class SlyceCamera
extends Handler
implements com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceCameraInterface
    Provides an integral camera functionality Set of methods that allow developers to perform continuous barcode detection, continuous 2D visual recognition (Premium feature), taking a snap, turn flash on/off, performing focus etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Asks the scanner to focus the underlying camera to a specific point.
      void handleMessage(Message msg) 
      void pause()
      Stops processing the frames, keeping the camera preview alive.
      void resume()
      Resumes processing the frames after a call to pause().
      void setContinuousRecognition(boolean value)
      Enable/Disable continuous recognition functionality.
      void shouldPauseScanner(boolean value)
      If set to false then after 2D/barcode detection the scanner will be resumed after 3 seconds.
      void snap()
      Perform an image recognition for the current frame.
      void start()
      Starts the camera preview and starts processing the frames.
      void stop()
      Stops processing the frames and stops camera preview.
      boolean turnFlash()
      Turns on/off the device flash.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlyceCamera

        public SlyceCamera(Activity activity,
           Slyce slyce,
           SurfaceView preview,
           JSONObject options,
           OnSlyceCameraListener listener)
        Parameters:
        activity - current Activity
        slyce - Slyce SDK instance. It must be opened.
        preview - the SurfaceView into which the camera preview will be displayed.
        options - use this JSONObject to pass properties to Slyce servers. Can be null.
        listener - the OnSlyceCameraListener to motify on results and errors.

      • turnFlash

        public boolean turnFlash()
        Turns on/off the device flash.
        Specified by:
        turnFlash in interface com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceCameraInterface

      • shouldPauseScanner

        public void shouldPauseScanner(boolean value)
        If set to false then after 2D/barcode detection the scanner will be resumed after 3 seconds. If set to true then after 2D/barcode detection the scanner will be paused, and will be resumed only by an explicit call to resume()
        Specified by:
        shouldPauseScanner in interface com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceCameraInterface

      • flipCamera

        public void flipCamera()
        Specified by:
        flipCamera in interface com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceCameraInterface

      • setContinuousRecognition

        public void setContinuousRecognition(boolean value)
        Enable/Disable continuous recognition functionality. Setting this value to false will stop recognizing barcodes in a Regular mode and will stop recognizing 2D products and barcodes in Premium mode. Default is true.
        Specified by:
        setContinuousRecognition in interface com.android.slyce.interfaces.SlyceCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        value - boolean

        public void handleMessage(Message msg)
